name: jsonFilter
description: mongoquery style for standard javascript collections

scripts.build: babel -o dist/commonjs/jsonFilter.js js/*.es6 && babel --modules amd -o dist/amd/jsonFilter.js js/*.es6 && babel --modules system -o dist/system/jsonFilter.js js/*.es6 && babel --modules umd -o dist/umd/jsonFilter.js js/*.es6

author: Jonathan Gotti
